bsc-nursing.title: B.Sc Nursing – Detailed Information
bsc-nursing.subtitle: Expand the sections below to learn more about our flagship nursing program.

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.degreeTitle: Bachelor of Science in Nursing – 8 Semester Course
overview.description: The B.Sc. Nursing degree program is a four-year fulltime program comprising eight semesters, which prepares a student to become a registered nurse qualified to practice in a variety of healthcare settings.
overview.system: Choice Based Credit System (CBCS) & Semester System, Competency Based Curriculum
overview.activities: Seminars, Workshops, Conferences, Guest Lectures, Projects, Clinical Presentations, Health Education

semesters.label: Semester I
semesters.mandatory: First Aid as part of Nursing Foundation I

semesters.label: Semester II
semesters.mandatory: Health Assessment as part of Nursing Foundation II

labs.title: Laboratory Facilities
labs.description: The college has well-equipped laboratories to support practical-based nursing education.

items.name: Nursing Foundation Department
items.description: Trains students on basic nursing procedures using simulation labs before hospital exposure.

items.name: Community Health Nursing Department
items.description: Focuses on preventive, promotive, and rehabilitative care through community engagement.

competencies.title: Core Competencies for B.Sc Nursing Graduates

items.title: Patient Centered Care
items.description: Provide holistic, compassionate, culturally appropriate care.

bot.title: Bachelor of Occupational Therapy – Detailed Information
bot.subtitle: Explore curriculum, labs, and professional competencies for BOT program.

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.description: The BOT program combines theoretical learning and practical training to help individuals regain independence through therapeutic activities.

labs.title: Laboratory Facilities
labs.description: BOT education is heavily practical with extensive lab and clinical exposure.

items.name: Occupational Therapy Department
items.description: Focuses on therapeutic rehabilitation and functional independence.

bpt.title: Bachelor of Physiotherapy – Detailed Information
bpt.subtitle: Expand the sections below to understand the curriculum, facilities, and professional outcomes of the Bachelor of Physiotherapy program.

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.description: The Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT) program is a comprehensive undergraduate course designed to prepare students to assess, diagnose, and treat physical impairments, movement disorders, and functional limitations. The program integrates strong theoretical foundations with extensive hands-on clinical training, enabling graduates to deliver evidence-based physiotherapy care across diverse healthcare settings.
overview.system: Annual Examination System with integrated clinical training
overview.eligibility: 10+2 with Science (Physics, Chemistry, Biology), as per University and regulatory norms
overview.activities: Clinical postings, patient assessments, case presentations, rehabilitation planning, workshops, seminars, hospital-based training, and community outreach programs

syllabus.title: Course Syllabus
syllabus.structureNote: The BPT curriculum is divided into four academic years followed by a compulsory internship.

internship.description: The compulsory internship is rotatory in nature and conducted in university-recognized teaching hospitals within Karnataka. Students receive intensive hands-on clinical exposure across multiple specialties.

labs.title: Laboratory Facilities
labs.description: Physiotherapy education is highly practical-oriented. The institution provides advanced laboratories and clinical facilities to ensure students gain real-world therapeutic and diagnostic experience.
items: Rehabilitation Equipment Lab (Ultrasound, IFT, TENS, Hot Packs, Treadmills, Balance Trainers, Mobility Aids)
Attached Teaching Hospitals and Clinical Training Units

items.name: Department of Physiotherapy
items.description: The Department of Physiotherapy focuses on developing competent physiotherapy professionals through integrated academic teaching, clinical exposure, and research-oriented learning. The department emphasizes patient-centered care, ethical practice, and interdisciplinary collaboration.
aims: Develop strong clinical reasoning and diagnostic skills
Prepare students for independent and hospital-based practice
achievements: Extensive clinical training partnerships with teaching hospitals
Community-based rehabilitation and health awareness programs
Student participation in sports injury management and wellness camps

competencies.title: Core Competencies for Bachelor of Physiotherapy Graduates

items.title: Clinical Assessment & Diagnosis
items.description: Ability to assess, diagnose, and manage movement dysfunctions and physical impairments using scientific and clinical reasoning.

items.title: Therapeutic Skills
items.description: Proficiency in exercise therapy, manual therapy, electrotherapy, and rehabilitation techniques.

items.title: Evidence-Based Practice
items.description: Apply research findings and clinical evidence to optimize patient outcomes.

items.title: Professionalism & Ethics
items.description: Demonstrate ethical practice, accountability, and professional conduct in patient care.

items.title: Communication & Teamwork
items.description: Work effectively with patients, families, and multidisciplinary healthcare teams.

items.title: Community & Preventive Care
items.description: Promote physical health, disability prevention, and rehabilitation at community and population levels.
